## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2781d258b292d5959839a52e0e940040defaae1ecbb1293c0d149dc5f6faf110)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'message_gateway' @ 0.0.1 (rubygems) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
